t: We Tested Dozens of Wet/Dry Vac—Here Are The Top 5 For Tackling Any Mess
s: While Shop-Vac® is a specific brand, Morgan says it’s also used as a generic term for vacuums that can be used for wet or dry applications, unlike household vacuums that can only be used for cleaning dry surfaces. All shop vacs can suck up dust, dirt, and other debris, but only those labeled as wet/dry vacuums are meant to suck up water and other liquids. They're ideal for use in the garage...
